pageContext.description: Awl,The awl appears to be in a stable condition. However, it is very slender and corrosion products may have replaced most of the original structure. Early Bronze Age.
pageContext.other: Site: Google maps shows a Pewit Farm near Wantage, Oxfordshire - but the geolocation tool cannot find the farm nor Charlton Down (except one in Dorset).  May not be accurate.
pageContext.publications: Trans. Newbury District Field Club, VIII, No. 2, 1939, 109.
pageContext.collection: Borough of Newbury Museum,Museum No. O.A. 257
pageContext.toSearch: Manor Road, Wantage, Oxfordshire Ox12, UK
